syntax.ExceededMaximumNumberOfParameters: Sorry you can't have more than 255 parameters.
syntax.InvalidAssignmentTarget:
Jiki can't work out what you're trying to do here.

Did you miss the `change` keyword?
syntax.InvalidNumericVariableName: Invalid variable name "{{name}}". Variable names cannot start with a number.
syntax.MissingBacktickToTerminateTemplateLitera: Missing backtick ('`') to terminate template literal.
syntax.MissingConditionAfterIf: Did you forget to add a condition to your if statement?
syntax.MissingCommaBetweenParameters: Did you forget to add a command after the `{{parameter}}` parameter?
syntax.MissingDoToStartBlock: Are you missing a `do` to start the {{type}} body?
syntax.MissingDoubleQuoteToStartString: Did you forget the start quote for the "{{string}}" string?
syntax.MissingDoubleQuoteToTerminateString:
Did you forget to add end quote? Maybe you meant to write:

```"{{string}}"```
syntax.MissingEndAfterBlock: Are you missing an `end` to finish the {{type}} body?
syntax.MissingEndOfLine: We didn't expect `{{current}}` to appear on this line after the `{{previous}}`. {{suggestion}}
syntax.MissingExpression: Jiki doesn't know what this means.
syntax.MissingFieldNameOrIndexAfterLeftBracket: Expect field name or index after '['.
syntax.InvalidFunctionName: Jiki couldn't work out what function you wanted to use here.
syntax.MissingFunctionName: Did you forget to give your function a name?
syntax.MissingLeftParenthesisAfterFunctionCall: Did you forget the start parenthesis when trying to call the {{function}} function?
syntax.MissingParameterName: Did you forget to add a parameter after `with`?
syntax.MissingRightBraceToTerminatePlaceholder: Missing right brace (`}`) to terminate placeholder.
syntax.MissingRightBracketAfterFieldNameOrIndex: Expect `]` after field name or index
syntax.MissingRightParenthesisAfterFunctionCall: Did you forget the end parenthesis when trying to call the {{function}} function?
syntax.MissingRightParenthesisAfterExpression: Did you forget to add a `)`?
syntax.MissingRightParenthesisAfterExpressionWi: Do you have a typo here? Did you mean `{{potential}}` instead of `{{actual}}`?
syntax.MissingRightParenthesisAfterParameters: Did you forget an `)` after parameters.
syntax.MissingWithBeforeParameters: Did you forget the `with` keyword before your parameters?
syntax.MissingToAfterVariableNameToInitializeVa: Did you forget to add the `to` after `{{name}}`?
syntax.MissingTimesInRepeat: Did you forget to write `times` after the number of times you want to repeat?
syntax.DuplicateParameterName: Did you accidently use the name `{{parameter}}` twice in your function parameters.
syntax.NumberContainsAlpha: A number cannot contain letters. Did you mean `{{suggestion}}`?
syntax.NumberEndsWithDecimalPoint: A number cannot end with a decimal point. Did you mean `{{suggestion}}`?
syntax.NumberStartsWithZero: A number cannot start with a zero. Did you mean `{{suggestion}}`?
syntax.NumberWithMultipleDecimalPoints: A number can only have one decimal point. Did you mean `{{suggestion}}`?
syntax.UnexpectedEqualsForAssignment: We don't use the equals sign (`=`) to assign variables in JikiScript. Use the `to` keyword instead.
syntax.UnexpectedElseWithoutIf: We can't work out which if statement this `else` belongs to. Did you forget to add an `if` statement before this `else`?
syntax.UnexpectedLiteralExpressionAfterIf: Did you forget to compare to things? In JikiScript the comparison (`is`, `==`, `>`, etc are always required).
syntax.UnexpectedSpaceInIdentifier: Did you accidently put a space in the middle of a variable name?
syntax.UnexpectedVariableExpressionAfterIf: Did you forget to compare to things? In JikiScript the comparison (`is`, `==`, `>`, etc are always required).
syntax.UnexpectedVariableExpressionAfterIfWithP: We were expecting some sort of comparison here. Did you mean to type `{{potential}}` instead of `{{actual}}`?
syntax.UnexpectedEqualsForEquality: To say "equals" in JikiScript, we use two equals signs (`==`). Did you forget one?
syntax.InvalidNestedFunction: You can't create a function within a function. Did you mean to create a function outside of this one?
syntax.UnexpectedChainedEquality: You can't chain equality operators like this. Did you mean to use `and` or `or` instead?

semantic.DuplicateVariableName: Already a variable with this name in this scope.
semantic.InvalidPostfixOperand: Invalid left-hand side for update expression.
semantic.VariableUsedInOwnInitializer: Can't read local variable in its own initializer

runtime.CouldNotFindFunction: Jiki couldn't find a function with the name `{{name}}`.
runtime.CouldNotFindFunctionWithSuggestion: Jiki couldn't find a function with the name `{{name}}`. Maybe you meant to use the `{{suggestion}}` function instead?
runtime.InfiniteLoop: Your code ran for too long and we stopped it to prevent an infinite loop.
runtime.MaxIterationsReached: You hit the maximum number of iterations allowed in this exercise ({{maxIterations}}). Try and find a more efficient way to solve the exercise.
runtime.InvalidIndexGetterTarget: Can't index object, only dictionaries and arrays can be indexed'.
runtime.InvalidIndexSetterTarget: Can only set dictionaries and arrays via indexer.
runtime.TooFewArguments: Did you forget an argument? This function expects to be called with {{arity}} arguments but you called it with {{numberOfArgs}}.
runtime.TooManyArguments: Did you add an extra argument? This function expects to be called with {{arity}} arguments but you called it with {{numberOfArgs}}.
runtime.InvalidNumberOfArgumentsWithOptionalArgu: Expected between {{minArity} and {{maxArity}} arguments but got {{numberOfArgs}}.
runtime.MissingParenthesesForFunctionCall:
Did you forget the parenthesis when trying to use this function?

Did you mean:

```{{name}}()```
runtime.OperandsMustBeNumbers: Both sides of the `{{operator}}` must be numbers. The {{side}} side is not a number. It is `{{value}}`.
runtime.OperandsMustBeTwoNumbersOrTwoStrings: Operands must be two numbers or two strings.
runtime.RepeatCountMustBeGreaterThanZero: You must repeat things at least once.
runtime.RepeatCountMustBeLessThanOneThousand: The most times you can repeat things is 1000.
runtime.RepeatCountMustBeNumber: repeat can only take a number as its argument.
runtime.VariableAlreadyDeclared: A variable with this name has already been created. Did you mean to use the change keyword?
runtime.VariableNotDeclared: Jiki couldn't find a variable or function with name `{{name}}`. Did you forget to use the `set` keyword to create a variable called `{{name}}` before this line of code?
runtime.VariableNotAccessibleInFunction:
There is not a variable `{{name}}` that Jiki can access inside this function. Did you forget to use the `set` keyword to create a new variable called `{{name}}` inside the function?

There is a variable called `{{name}}` outside the function, but Jiki can't reach that from in here.
runtime.UnexpectedUncalledFunction: You used a function as if it's a variable. Did you mean to use it by adding `()` at the end?
runtime.FunctionAlreadyDeclared: There is already a function called `{{name}}`. Please choose a different name for this variable.
runtime.UnexpectedChangeOfFunction:
You are trying to change `{{name}}` but it is a function, not a variable.

It is not a box that you can change the contents of. It is machine for you to use.
runtime.FunctionCallTypeMismatch: Jiki expected input {{argIdx}} to be a {{expectedType}} but it was actually a {{actualType}}.
runtime.UnexpectedReturnOutsideOfFunction: You used the `return` keyword, but you're not inside a function. So Jiki has nothing to return out from.
runtime.ExpectedFunctionNotFound: Jiki couldn't find the `{{name}}` function. Have you defined it correctly?
runtime.ExpectedFunctionHasWrongArguments: Jiki tried to run the `{{name}}` function but it had a different amount of inputs to what he expected.

disabledLanguageFeature.ExcludeListViolation: Jiki doesn't know how to use `{{lexeme}}` in this exercise.
disabledLanguageFeature.IncludeListViolation: Jiki doesn't know how to use `{{lexeme}}` in this exercise.
